metadata.name: Daydreams
metadata.description:
"She finds herself lost in thought instead of focused on the task at hand. She dreams of what else could be out there, of other beings and the planets they inhabit. She dreams of the day she'll visit the stars beyond and witness the magic of the cosmos."

I created this collection as a reflection of myself, struggling with the transition from full-time working mom to a stay-at-home mom. Suddenly instead of Zoom calls and emails, I was bombarded with dishes and laundry. I often found myself daydreaming of web3 and listening to Twitter spaces instead of sweeping the floors and scrubbing toilets. 

This piece was created digitally on my iPad using the program Procreate and my Apple Pencil. According to the Canvas Information the tracked time for this piece is 39h 30m. 

Canvas Size: 2048px x 2732px
